pages.text: The $(item)Vortex Cannon/$ is a weapon which shoots $(thing)vortices/$: air spinning in a way that it doesn't have much friction and can be mostly stable.$(p)You can use this to shoot gusts at the target of choice: to repel enemies, push animals around, uproot plants and leaves, or shear entities.

The higher the $(item)Vortex Cannon/$ is pressurized, the more impact it has on its targets and the greater its range is.$(p)Note that it's possible to catch yourself in a fired vortex, which can be very useful for fast transport. But beware: it provides no fall damage protection!
